title: (x) Royal - Shelley Allegro, ITC Novarese {Tim D}
author: contohabc

comments.content:
Shelley Allegro for the R  
Tim

And somebody has been cruel to Novarese.  
What are you doing with all these ids? Not that it matters just idle curiousity.  
Tim

Acutally, I am a namecard design, I always looking for a beautiful  
font so that I can used for my design, thank for your reply, please  
kindly tell me what is the font of oyal

Thank you very much for your reply.  
Thanks

I believe the oyal is in ITC Novarese expanded too much the O is very stretched.  
http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/itc-novarese/  
Good luck with your work.  
Tim
